Half-Life 2 and Counter-Strike Source

Posted on Wednesday, May 12, 2004

The E3 2004 Trailer for HL2 is out! Check it out here. The other very cool thing is that Counter-Strike will be released on the Source Engine with the release of Half-Life 2. CS Nation has a really good preview of the release which is expected to come out tonight.
